ioc.description:
2e789fc5aa1318d0286264d70b2ececa15664689efa4f47c485d84df55231ac4 is a High suspicious SHA256.
This SHA256 is linked to a malware attack of the PLEAD family and organised by BlackTech intrusion set.
We advised to use this IoC in detection mode.
